summary: Dr. John L. Hill permanently surrendered his medical license (D20662) to the Maryland State Board of Physicians, effective August 13, 2019. This action was taken to avoid further prosecution of disciplinary charges filed against him on April 9, 2019, with the understanding that the charges would be treated as proven. As a result, Dr. Hill is permanently prohibited from practicing medicine in Maryland, and the surrender will be reported to national databases.
